mapper.sql: id, type, user_id, coupon_code, is_used, price, full_price, product_id, overdue_time, create_time, modify_time
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO product_coupon (type, coupon_code, is_used, price, full_price, product_id, overdue_time, create_time, modify_time) VALUES
( #{item.type}, #{item.couponCode}, #{item.isUsed}, #{item.price}, #{item.fullPrice}, #{item.productId}, #{item.overdueTime}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.modifyTime})
mapper.select: SELECT cou.id, cou.type, cou.user_id, cou.is_used, cou.price, cou.full_price, cou.product_id, cou.overdue_time, pro.products FROM product_coupon cou LEFT JOIN st_products pro ON cou.product_id = pro.id WHERE cou.user_id=#{uid} ORDER BY cou.is_used limit #{offset},#{limit}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM product_coupon cou WHERE cou.user_id=#{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into product_coupon (id, type, user_id, coupon_code, is_used, price, full_price, product_id, overdue_time, create_time, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{couponCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUsed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fullPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{overdueTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update product_coupon
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
coupon_code = #{couponCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_used = #{isUsed,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
full_price = #{fullPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
overdue_time = #{overdueTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update product_coupon set type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, coupon_code = #{couponCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_used = #{isUsed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, full_price = #{fullPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, overdue_time = #{overdueTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
